Nuclear_Launch_Lock.help: The Warwalker must lock onto a target before unleashing its mighty Orbital Lance. Recharge: Slow

Nuclear_Launch_Tell.help: The Warwalker must lock onto a target before unleashing its mighty Orbital Lance.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} targets your location with their Orbital Lance!

Nuclear_Launch.help: The Orbital Lance is the most powerful weapon in the Warwalker's arsenal. It is capable of obliterating most targets in a single shot. However, it is easy enough to avoid.
Nuclear_Launch.targetHelp: Your regeneration has been reduced by the plasma burns.

Targetable.help: Marshal Blitz's Flier is an easy target to acquire...

Untouchable.help: Marshal Blitz has stolen designs for early prototypes of Lord Recluse's Power Transfer Towers. While they are not able to empower him as they did Recluse, he has managed to empower his custom Bane Spider armor with them, allowing it to repel all attacks.
Untouchable.targetHelp: Marshal Blitz has stolen designs for early prototypes of Lord Recluse's Power Transfer Towers. While they are not able to empower him as they did Recluse, he has managed to empower his custom Bane Spider armor with them, allowing it to repel all attacks.

Incendiary_Swarm_Missiles.help: Missile Turrets can launch a pack of 8 Incendiary Swarm missiles. Recharge: Fast

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} blasts you with its Swarm Missile for {Damage} points of lethal damage!
{PlayerSource} blasts you with its Swarm Missile for {Damage} points of fire damage!

Protection_Bubble.help: Penelope Yin is focusing all of her energy to create a protection from Rula-Wade's apocalypse beam!
Protection_Bubble.targetHelp: Penelope Yin is focusing all of her energy to create a protection from Rula-Wade's apocalypse beam!

Ranged_Shot.help: A long range shot that blasts your foes. Like most sniper attacks, this power has a bonus to Accuracy, but is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

Absorb_Rularuu.attackerAttack: The end is here. You shall not delay it any further.
We are Rularuu. You will not destroy what is eternal!

Apocalypse_Blast.help: Rula-Wade is launching an all-out assault to stop you, sending immense beams of power through space towards the island you're fighting on!
